Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD made a patently unreasonable factual finding regarding the genuineness of the marriage
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal from refusal of spousal sponsorship
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Marriage lacked compatibility due to age, marital status, financial disparity, and limited knowledge of each otherâ€™s lives
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine or entered primarily for immigration benefits
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Applicant claimed phone bills and letters were ignored; court found they were considered
Crimes.Application_Factor: Spousal sponsorship application refused due to suspected misrepresentation
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Factual finding of lack of genuine marriage
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA provisions on spousal sponsorship and genuineness of marriage
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence to prove genuine relationship despite documentary submissions
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach of natural justice found
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubt cast on authenticity and depth of marital relationship
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that IAD ignored relevant evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review on factual findings

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration sponsorship appeal based on alleged marriage fraud
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD's finding of marriage fraud breached natural justice or was an error in law
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal following refusal of spousal sponsorship due to suspected marriage fraud
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Marriage lacked genuineness based on age, finances, and knowledge gaps
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA - prohibition of marriages of convenience
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered primarily for immigration benefits
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Alleged by applicant; court determined evidence was considered
Crimes.Application_Factor: Sponsorship application denied due to suspicion of fraudulent marriage
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Finding of marriage fraud and procedural fairness
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on genuine marital relationships
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage not genuine / marriage of convenience
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA sections related to spousal sponsorship and marriage fraud
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Documentary evidence insufficient to overcome credibility concerns
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach of natural justice found
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about authenticity of marital relationship
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD's factual findings and alleged disregard of evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review of administrative decisions
